metadata.title: CVE-2017-17670 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In VideoLAN VLC media player through 2.2.8, there is a type conversionvulnerability in modules/demux/mp4/libmp4.c in the MP4 demux module leadingto a invalid free, because the type of a box may be changed between a readoperation and a free operation.

criterions.comment: vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
